column4: can someone please help me with viewing .wmv files in ubuntu, i tried to install xine but i dont know how :(
vwow: ok how do i install that
install all the gstreamer packages  good bad and ugly
sudo apt-get install gstreamer0.10-pitfdll gstreamer0.10-ffmpeg gstreamer0.10-plugins-bad
Package mplayer is not available, but is referred to by another package.
you're still going to have to install the gstreamer packages , try using adept it's graphical it will make it easier
ok so what do i do ?
i already went to those websites i dont know how to use those things
the first one tells you how to get multimedia support,  you just have to copy one long command line to the terminal and you will have all the codecs you need,  take the time to read it
I use compiz and I never get that so I guess yes
alt-f2 and type nautilus  , then close
it usualy starts, but I've had some occasions where it just stoped , I had to restart it ,  check in menu > system > prefs > prog on startup or something like that , make sure it is listed
